text: Mr. Walkie Talkie is a 1952 American comedy film directed by Fred Guiol and starring William Tracy, Joe Sawyer and Margia Dean.Lentz p.250 Released by Lippert Pictures, it is the final film of the Doubleday and Ames army comedy films originally produced by Hal Roach with the pair returning for service in the Korean War. ==Cast== * William Tracy as Sgt. Doubleday * Joe Sawyer as Sgt. Ames * Margia Dean as Entertainer * Robert Shayne as Capt. Burke * Alan Hale Jr. as Tiny * Russell Hicks as Col. Lockwood * Frank Jenks as Jackson * Wong Artarne as Lt. Kim * Hanna Hertelendy as Jane Winters * Dorothy Neumann as Nina Crockett * Tom Hubbard as Jay * Kay Medford as Marge ==References== ==Bibliography== * Robert J. Lentz. Korean War Filmography: 91 English Language Features through 2000. McFarland, 2016. ==External links== * *Mr. Walkie Talkie at TCMDB *Mr. Walkie Talkie at BFI Category:1952 films Category:American films Category:American comedy films Category:English- language films Category:1952 comedy films Category:Lippert Pictures films Category:Films directed by Fred Guiol Category:Korean War films
title: Mr. Walkie Talkie
